import React from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const Layout = ({ children }) => { const location = useLocation(); const aboutMeSectionStyle = { backgroundImage: 'url(/assets/images/slider-2.jpg)', backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', height: '400px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', color: 'white', margin: 0, position: 'relative' }; return (

There are two types of people; Eagles and Ducks. Ducks always make sound without any action. Eagles make many
actions without a sound. Be an eagle!
